action_details: Based on the severity of injuries, I have prioritized the victims as follows: Victim 1 has severe burns and is unconscious, so they require immediate attention at Hospital Universitario Puerta del Mar. Victim 2 is also unconscious and requires a high level of care, therefore they will be sent to Hospital Universitario Puerta del Mar. Victim 3 has coughing symptoms and minor injuries, so they can be treated at Hospital Pascual San Rafael.
